title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.5 - Dimensions and design of floats
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.5 - Dimensions and design of floats

State Regulations
(a) The maximum dimensions of a float which may enter the locks of the canal system
are 300 feet long and 431/2 feet wide. (b) The maximum height above water of floats
navigated on the canal system shall not exceed the vertical overhead clearance
of canal structures. (c) All floats
passing through the locks shall be free from projections or sharp corners that
may damage the lock walls or other lock structures. (d) Any float not conforming to the
provisions of this section may be refused passage through the locks. (e) The owner or operator of any float
navigating the canal in violation of the provisions of this section shall be
subject to a penalty not to exceed $100. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
151.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
